column4: I just installed sun-java6-jre but I have no 'java' on my path. Any ideas?
What are you trying to do?
I want to run a jar file, java -jar 'somejarfile.jar'
that's the problem, there's no java on the path.
because I installed the package 'sun-java6-jre' and would expect it to be on the path
there is no java binary in /usr/bin
I think you can just add to path:  PATH=$PATH:/usr/bin
which java shows a blank line
But I think it is just java
thanks for your help, but I don't think you understand the problem. I have installed the package 'sun-java6-jre' which should place the 'java' binary in /usr/bin/java. It's not there.
